Articles.Content:
Howdy!

I've been lurking since the tail end of last year, but I've stayed off the board for the most part. Remember when you didn't know you failed to achieve orbit until you slammed into the ground? Good times.

Edited July 3, 2014 by Warbird
Good lord I was terrible at forming complete sentences. Also, who knew there wasn't an editing date limit here?

Welcome to the forums!

Your friendly neighborhood bag of bones,

-Drakomis

Welcome to the KSP forums. Zombie free since 2011.

Nice to have you on the forums.

For now.

GroundHOG2010

Welcome to the KSP forums. Zombie free since 2011.

Nice to have you on the forums.

For now.

GroundHOG2010

Borderline GroundHOG, what\'s with the For now? Anyway, welcome to the Forums Warbird.

-DR

Borderline GroundHOG, what\'s with the For now?

Could you rephrase that into a properly grammatical structure? I am having difficulty parsing the statement.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome to the forums.

I hope you enjoy killing kerbals in massive fiery explosions.

Could you rephrase that into a properly grammatical structure? I am having difficulty parsing the statement.

I think he meant:

You are at the borderline GroundHOG, what\'s with the 'For now'?

wasn\'t a personal attack, but merely a side joke.

Yeah, I think I misread what GroundHOG wrote there...it read a certain way to me, like an insult to the new person. But seems like it wasn\'t and was just some humor, apologies new person and apologies GroundHOG.

-DR

[Redacted]

Edited July 3, 2014 by Warbird
Ever think back to something stupid you did a while ago and cringe? That's what I'm doing now.

Hey Warbird,

Wow that must have been a really early version. Glad you decided to join the forums!

See you around,

thor
Apollo 18 was taken by a crappy movie and Apollo -1 was just silly.
